Class MainViewController

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class handles the logic for the main view of the application.

        Filters ObservableArray list of appointments to include appointments within a specified time range. LAMBDA: Statement lambda used to filter ObservableList stream to include appointments within the time range.
        Parameters:
        start - Start of time range.
        end - End of time range.
        Returns:
        ObservableArray of appointments.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes the main view UI. LAMBDA: Expression lambda used for adding a listener to the TabPane. This makes it easier to changing UI elements when the scene changes. LAMBDA: Expression lambda used for setting a listener to the customerTableView. This is useful for capturing the selected customer, as well as changing UI elements when the selection changes.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
